channel.title: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!
channel.description:
Hey there! I know all the X and Y stuff and like ::mypos. but i have an issue now. I have not coded for a long time, and forgot how to add npcs. I need to know where i can add npc's, then make them talk
I dont want to replace an npc, i want to add on to the "List". Same with the npc talking,
someone make a lil tutorial for me? would be great :)
thanx

item.title: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!
item.dc:creator: @KoF KoF
item.description:
@KoF wrote:

above ther heads u can find at npchandler class
and place npc at autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!

item.title: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

DePredaTe:

Logga, be quiet dude. He just tried to help. You aren’t helping at all. Only post something if it helps the person. Jeez. I’ve been seeing a lot of your useless replies. It is quickly getting on my nerves.

While that’s true, if XeleXoft had just used the search bar, he would have found the answer much quicker, and wouldn’t of had to make this thread in the first place. So sometimes people don’t want to answer the same question over and over, and therefore purposefully don’t help.

Read full topic
item.source: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!

item.title: Help adding NPC's And Making them Talk!
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

Logga, be quiet dude. He just tried to help. You aren’t helping at all. Only post something if it helps the person. Jeez. I’ve been seeing a lot of your useless replies. It is quickly getting on my nerves.

                    if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
                        if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                            npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXTHERE TEXTHERE!";
                        }
                    }

Place that in NpcHandler.java

spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	0	RANGEX1	RANGEY1	RANGEX2	RANGEy2	WALKTYPE

Place that and fill in everything in autospawn.java

There you go. :}

Read full topic
